attributes.action: Stop percecuting britains road users, and using them as "Cash Cows" for the treasury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years the "Average" motorist has suffered unfair taxation at the hands of governments.
This includes Road tax, Fuel duty, Insurance tax, the cost of an annual MOT, congestion charging, parking fee's, speed camera generated revenue. As well as the proposed road charging time.
All these "Taxes" do is make the average driver worse off.

I propose they should all be scrapped or severely reduced.

WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH MR BLAIR!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
